Ogilvy Interactive, part of the Ogilvy One Worldwide unit of Ogilvy & Mather, is forming a consortium with three new media companies to offer clients additional access to services like Web site design and creative production of Webcasts. Each member of the syndicate will operate autonomously ently when they are not collaborating.

The other consortium members are: EgoMedia in New York, JumpCut in New York and MindTree Consulting in Somerville, N.J. The syndicate is similar to one formed by a sibling of Ogilvy Interactive, Ogilvy & Mather North America, whereby that agency collaborates with small, independent advertising agencies.
